'''Enarat''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|An orlan woman stands over a table laden with herbs and spices. She mixes them without looking at her work, pausing now and then to raise a sprig or phial to her nose.
You realize she is blind.}}

Enarat sells a variety of gear from her shop in [Delver's Row](/delversRow/) - "Enerat's Leather and Goods".
